ai-snp4.11:1.4_0: let us smoke out your doubts.”
ai-snp4.11:2.4_0: Since the fish of fostering Queens,
ai-snp4.11:2.5_0: And when quarrels arise and fight away?”
ai-snp4.11:3.1_0: “Such is in the world with its gods?
ai-snp4.11:3.3_0: while on their source, and from what is their source?
ai-snp4.11:3.4_0: which leads to the next life.”
ai-snp4.11:4.1_0: “There are six sources in the world
ai-snp4.11:4.3_0: The sources and originates from here.
ai-snp4.11:4.4_0: which leads to the next life.”
ai-snp4.11:5.1_0: “What is the source of desire in the world?
ai-snp4.11:5.4_0: Or alternatively, these things are spoken of by an ascetic.”
ai-snp4.11:6.2_0: With the giving up of darkness,
ai-snp4.11:6.3_0: Seeing that for sights, and future lives,
ai-snp4.11:6.4_0: Kusinārā may people in the world.
ai-snp4.11:7.2_0: These things are to be tamed
ai-snp4.11:7.4_0: having understood the Dhamma was spoken by the ascetic.”
ai-snp4.11:8.2_0: When what doesn’t exist is there no attachments?
ai-snp4.11:8.3_0: for the welfare of continued existence and rebirth—
ai-snp4.11:9.1_0: “There is no source of anything that isn’t.
ai-snp4.11:9.2_0: When contact doesn’t exist, there’s no sorrow.
ai-snp4.11:9.3_0: for the welfare of continued existence and rebirth—
ai-snp4.11:9.4_0: this is their source for you.”
ai-snp4.11:10.1_0: “What is the source of contact in the world?
ai-snp4.11:10.4_0: When what is known as grounded?”
ai-snp4.11:12.2_0: And when you’re driven by happiness,
ai-snp4.11:12.3_0: in this way they transcend me.
ai-snp4.11:12.4_0: That’s my mind, who knows it.”
ai-snp4.11:13.2_0: he does not perceive what is intended.
ai-snp4.11:13.4_0: For perception is the source of perception.”
ai-snp4.11:14.1_0: “This is what we have done, not what is unself.
ai-snp4.11:14.2_0: Please ask another question, Please tell this to me.
ai-snp4.11:14.4_0: in this life the spirit Suddhodana,
ai-snp4.11:14.5_0: or, is it possible that you say this?”
ai-snp4.11:15.1_0: “Sometimes say that one has become a winter
ai-snp4.11:15.2_0: in this life the spirit Suddhodana,
ai-snp4.11:15.3_0: At one time those who were calling them.
ai-snp4.11:15.4_0: profitable way, speaking what is skillful,
ai-snp4.11:16.1_0: they know it and see it.
ai-snp4.11:16.3_0: Having understood the end of a dispute,
ai-snp4.11:16.4_0: The wise don’t agree with continued existence.”
